Package com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root

Interface Summary
FieldInformerLocator Field informer locator is able to combine all existing informations about a field in order to build the most comprehensive FieldInformer
InformerFactory Interface allowing dynamic finding of informer associated to given bean class
Validable Validable objects allows validation, which can send runtime exception to inform us objects aren't valid
 

Class Summary
AbstractFinderService<DataType,InformerType extends Informer<DataType>> Base class for finder service providing the required finder abstractioncs
AbstractInformerFactory A base class allowing easy definition of a Map of extended informers
AbstractQueryStatement<DataType,InformerType extends Informer<DataType>> base class for query executable statements.
BasicFieldInformerLocator Provides field locator behaviour for the basic classes
CumulativeFieldInformerLocator Cumulative field informer locator allows usage of multiple FieldInformerLocator simultaneoulsy.
DelegatingInformerLocator Informer lcoator allowing ordered delegation between a first locator ... and a second (crazy, no ?).
InformerClassInvocationHandler<InformerType extends Informer<ContainedType>,ContainedType> This invocation handler will transform calls to synthetic informers getters into calls to the InformerClassInvocationHandler.realInformer's Informer.get(String) method.
LazyInterfaceInformerLocator Informer locator solving the very special case of fields declared using business interface.
ProxyBackedInformerFactory This time come the authentical rock'n'roll !
ReflectionBackedInformer<DataType>  
ReflectionBackedInformerFactory Global informer factories allow lookup of specific class informers, as long as they're loaded.
SubInformerMethodResolver Sub-informer class method resolver
UnsafeInformerFactory A subclass of informer factory providing type-unsafe informer creation (or sorta)
 

Exception Summary
BadPrefixException A bad prefix exception is thrown when the method don't start with {value InformerClassInvocationHandler#SYNTHETIC_GETTER_PREFIX}.
CantMatchMethodToCodeException Base class for exceptions concerning matching between declaration and executed code
ConflictingInformersForThisTypeException  
EmptyGetDontWorkException Writing an empty get shouldn't work
InvocationFailedException Embedding exception for all invokation issues
MethodConstructedOnMissingField  
NoInformerForThisTypeException  
NoLocatorAllowsFieldException  
NoSuchFieldInHierarchyException  
ReturnTypeMismatchException Exception thrown when return type of method declaration does not match expected return type
UnableToCreateFieldInformerException  
UnableToLocateInformerForException
